vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐξορκ-ιστής, οῦ, ὁ,
exorcist, [NT+2nd c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: one driving out evil spirits, exorcist
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
one driving out evil spirits, exorcist
primarily one who puts an oath; in NT an exorcist, one who by various kinds of incantations, etc., pretended to expel demons, Acts 19:13*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: exorcista (alguien que expulsa espíritus malignos con fórmulas mágicas)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: thầy trừ quỉ; thầy trừ tà. Xem G1844
